name: cake
questions: How do we get everyone to agree that chocolate cake is best?
How do we persuade local bakeries to provide free cakes?
How do we encourage doctors to reclassify cake as health food?

roles.name: Baker
roles.bio: Cake-conjuring wizard, spongy to the touch

agenda_items.description: Involves the bankrupting of all other bakeries
Increases the desirability of excessive cake-eating
At least quintuples the value of cake

roles.name: Doctor
roles.bio: Crotchety and mean destroyer of happiness

agenda_items.description: Restaurants that exclusively serve raw, unseasoned bok choy

roles.name: #Wade
roles.bio: An omnivorous scavenger who feeds on organic materials

agenda_items.description: Free samples from bakeries are the size of full cakes

roles.name: Candy Manufacturer
roles.bio: Owner of a small candy shop who's seen a dropoff in sales

agenda_items.description: Brings back the glory days of candy
Conjures images of the Good Old Days
Invention of a cake & candy hybrid

roles.name: Marty
roles.bio: Rose from the dead on the third day and has decided to stick around

agenda_items.description: Cake that tastes almost as good as shit
